name: Car Racing (Shady Night)
description:
Hi guys, it's me again - Shady Night with another new game! It's kind of like a racing with 2 other AI opponents. And surprisingly I made it in previous year so I thought why not to polish it a bit and upload it for everyone!

//CONTROLS\\

> [W] to accelerate car.

> [S] to decelerate car.

> [A] to steer left.

> [D] to steer right.

> [E] to get out / in car.

> [WASD] to move player.

> [Q] to show / hide cursor.

> [Mouse Sensitivity] is on top right corner!
